name: Tri-Lock
description:
Tri-Lock is a short first-person puzzle game (5~10 minutes playing). You have to use your weapon to interact with triangular blocks in order to make your way to the next room. There are a total of four rooms to be cleared.

This is my first game.

How to play:

+ Use WASD to move

+ Use "Space" to Jump

+ Use "C" to Crouch

+ When aiming at a triangular block, hold the "Right Mouse Button" to pull it out

+ Use "Left Mouse Button" to shoot

Have a good day!
